title: Instinct
description: 776 has escaped from RIP, again. Wunder is missing, she just disappeared from their bed and Pete is losing it. No leads, no possibilities. His one and only focus is to find her. He plans to use their connection, the one they’ve had for decades but never really knew it until they met. He wants to try and reach her through their dreams as he’d done before.Is there a way to get back what they shared before they even met, or is Wunder lost to him forever?
author: A.R. Von
